name: Zingy
overview: Zingy, Inc. creates, publishes, licenses, and distributes products and services to mobile consumers in North America, South America, and Europe. Its products include ringtones, ringbacks, wallpapers, games, and video, as well as information and community-based applications. The company also provides content management and distribution services to various blue-chip partners, including carriers and media companies. In addition, it offers entertainment, including made-for-mobile videos, music, and character development to young adults. The company, through relationships with mobile operators, media firms, and brands runs a distribution network that spans the United States, Canada, Europe, Latin America, Asia, and Australia.
